DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
This effect has not yet been included and is currently on my to-do list.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
For every 3 stacks of [#8b0000]Vicious you deal 1 and take 2 extra damage. Certain cards gain new effects based on [#8b0000]Vicious.
Spend [#8b0000]Vicious to debuff your enemies or force their actions.
[#3abfbe]Mana [#3abfbe]burned creatures lose 1-3% Max HP per stack when casting buffs, debuffs and spells. Certain cards gain new effects against [#3abfbe]Mana [#3abfbe]burned enemies.
Deal 50% bonus damage to enemies with Block.
Enemies lose HP equal to half the destroyed Block.
Increase the [#3333aa]Ink counter to create delayed attacks or reactive defense.
[#990000]Lacerated creatures lose 2-6% of their Max HP per stack every turn (minimum 1).
[#990000]Hemorrhaging creatures lose 6% of their Max HP per stack every turn (minimum 1).
Currently not yet implemented. Increase the power of this and other Fenrir cards for the current combat whenever you meet the condition.
Add excess damage to your next 'Fenrir Unleashed' attack whenever you kill an enemy.
[#9aa3a3]Legendary [#9aa3a3]Weapons are unique cards with strong effects and drawbacks.
Staggered creatures deal and gain 25-50% less damage and block respectively.
Can only be applied to non-attacking enemies. NL Taunted enemies are forced to attack and deal 10% max HP damage.
Can only be applied to attacking enemies. NL Intimidated enemies are forced to defend and gain Block equal to 10 plus half your Vicious.
